title: El Niño - low anchovy catch off the coast of Peru

content.question: The low anchovy catch in 1998 was most likely the result of

choices.label: an increase in the number of hurricanes
an increase in the population of anchovy predators
reduced ocean upwelling along the coast
reduced surface runoff due to drought

content.answer: reduced ocean upwelling along the coast

skill.text: Skill 5.C: Explain patterns and trends in data to draw conclusions.
